bullets: Students in this course will learn to apply machine learning algorithms to real-world datasets.
The curriculum covers supervised learning fundamentals including linear regression, logistic regression, and decision trees.
Each module includes hands-on coding exercises using Python and scikit-learn.
Students complete a final project analyzing a dataset of their choice.
The microservices architecture enables independent deployment and scaling of application components.
Each service communicates via REST APIs using JSON payloads.
Load balancing distributes requests across service instances using NGINX.
Service discovery is handled by Consul with health checks monitoring endpoint availability.
The digital transformation initiative reduced operational costs by 23% in Q3 2025.
Employee productivity increased 18% after implementing the new workflow automation tools.
Customer satisfaction scores improved from 72% to 86% following the new UX redesign.
The cloud migration project completed two months ahead of schedule, saving $1.2M in infrastructure costs.
Cloud computing provides scalable resources on demand, allowing organizations to adjust infrastructure capacity based on actual usage.
Cloud providers manage security and compliance with extensive expertise and certifications.
Companies reduce capital expenditure by eliminating upfront hardware costs and paying only for consumed resources.
Global reach enables companies to serve customers worldwide with low-latency performance.
Comparison of 4 options across Basic, Premium
Storage: Basic = 10GB
Users: Basic = 5
Support: Basic = Email

Introduction to Neural Networks
The shift from on-premises data centers to cloud-based services represents a paradigm change in IT strategy.
Global reach enables organizations to serve customers worldwide with low-latency performance through distributed data centers.
Development teams leverage platform services to accelerate application delivery, utilizing managed databases, container orchestration, and serverless computing.
Organizations benefit from elastic scalability, allowing them to dynamically adjust resources based on demand patterns.
The new analytics platform processes 10 million events per day with sub-second latency.
The system uses Apache Kafka for event streaming and ClickHouse for real-time analytics.
Development time decreased from 6 months to 2 months using microservices architecture.
Teams deploy updates 5x more frequently with zero downtime.
AI ethics considerations include fairness, accountability, transparency, and privacy protection.
Organizations must ensure AI systems do not perpetuate biases or discriminate against protected groups.
